wildType.i@proto: wildcard $i must be of type non-null object, value: {{-type,valueType}}
wildType.i@hades: wildcard ~[$i] must be of type non-null object, ~[value] {{-type,valueType@hades}}
wildType.r@proto: wildcard $r must be one of type string or an instance of Array, value: {{-type,valueType}}
wildType.r@hades: wildcard ~[$r] must be one of type ~{string} or an instance of ~{Array}, ~[value] {{-type,valueType@hades}}
wildType.$@proto: wildcard $$ must be of type string, value: {{-type,valueType}}
